name: model-mgmt-tutorial
title: Advanced Tutorial
description:
Use Dataloop Python SDK to create, train, inference and manage ML Models.

See our SDK Getting Started guide at https://docs.dataloop.ai/docs/sdk-register.

content.description: Upload and filter model predictions annotations
Use marketplace models to train offline

Use the SDK and the Dataset Tools to iterate, augment and serve the data to your model
